text:
起飛時，氣流會貼著有弧度的擾流板流動，這個吸附現象就是康達效應😁
當氣流流過上凹的擾流板時，擾流板會給氣流向上的作用力，同時氣流會給予向下的反作用力使機頭揚起、改變飛行方向，這樣紙飛機就能飛回手中囉~😏
text_en:
When taking off, the airflow will flow against the curved spoiler. This adsorption phenomenon is the Kangda effect😁
When the airflow flows through the concave spoiler, the spoiler will give upward force to the airflow, and at the same time, the airflow will give downward reaction force to raise the nose and change the direction of flight, so that the paper airplane can fly back to the hand啰~😏

text:
重心是物體重量的集中點，重心越低越容易平衡(例如蹲著比站直更穩定)😎
在小鳥兩側的翅膀上加上訂書針，使重心轉移到鳥嘴的下方，這樣小鳥就能達到平衡囉~😁
text_en:
The center of gravity is the concentration point of the weight of the object. The lower the center of gravity, the easier it is to balance (for example, squatting is more stable than standing straight)😎
Add staples to the wings on both sides of the bird to shift the center of gravity to the bottom of the beak, so that the bird can achieve balance~😁

text:
紙杯向前飛行時迎面而來的氣流，與向前旋轉時紙杯下方的氣流，方向一樣是往後的，使下方氣流流速比上方快😁
柏努力定律：流速越快、壓力越小
紙杯飛出去後往壓力小的方向靠近，就會看到影片內奇怪的飛行軌跡囉~😎
柏努力定律只是其中一個因素哦~
text_en:
When the paper cup flies forward, the oncoming airflow is the same as the airflow under the paper cup when it rotates forward. The direction is the same, so that the airflow velocity below is faster than that above 😁
Perlier's law: the faster the flow rate, the lower the pressure
After the paper cup flies out and approach it in a direction with less pressure, you will see the strange flight path in the movie~😎
Baili Efforts Law is only one of the factors~

text:
物體在高處時，會有一股叫”重力位能”的潛在能量。
乒乓球落地時，部分的重力位能會轉化為動能，使乒乓球彈起來(黃箭頭)。
當水杯和乒乓球一起落下時，水杯的能量會傳給乒乓球，讓乒乓球彈得更高哦(紫箭頭)。😁
text_en:
When an object is at a high place, there is a potential energy called "gravitational potential energy".
When the ping pong ball hits the ground, part of the gravitational potential energy will be converted into kinetic energy, causing the ping pong ball to bounce (yellow arrow).
When the water cup and the ping pong ball fall together, the energy of the water cup will be transferred to the ping pong ball, making the ping pong ball play higher (purple arrow). 😁

text:
內外杯的夾層中，除了豆漿還有空氣
當堵住外杯的洞口時，夾層的壓力狀態達到平衡，豆漿就停住不動😏
但如果把洞放開，外面的空氣就會進入夾層，將豆漿往下擠，擠到内杯裡，直到內外的”大氣壓力”達到平衡哦😁
text_en:
In the interlayer of the inner and outer cups, there is air in addition to soy milk
When the hole of the outer cup is blocked, the pressure state of the interlayer reaches equilibrium, and the soy milk will stop moving 😏
But if you let go of the hole, the outside air will enter the interlayer, squeeze the soy milk down and squeeze it into the inner cup until the "atmospheric pressure" inside and outside reaches a balance 😁

工業化之前，鐵釘都得一個一個敲出來，又貴又不夠堅硬…
而榫卯結構可以防止木件扭動、也不會生鏽，很多榫卯結構的家具與建築，經過上百年還完好如初哦😎
text_en:
The tenon is convex and the mortise is concave. It is a way of combining components in woodwork, which is often used in construction or furniture.
Before industrialization, the nails had to be knocked out one by one. They were expensive and not hard enough...
The tenon and tenon structure can prevent the wood from twisting and will not rust. Many furniture and buildings with tenon and tenon structure are still intact after hundreds of years😎
